item.title: White House denies defying judge's order over deportations to El Salvador
item.description: An order to halt the removal of 261 people came too late and had "no legal basis" anyway, the White House says.

item.title: Rwanda severs ties with Belgium over 'neo-colonial delusions'
item.description: In a strongly worded statement, Rwanda accuses Belgium of "lies and manipulation".

item.title: Trade turmoil forecast to slash growth in Canada and Mexico
item.description: Trump's tariffs will hit its biggest steel trading partners' economies the most, the OECD predicts.

item.title: Carney meets Macron on first foreign visit as PM
item.description: Carney described Canada as the "most European of non-European countries".

item.title: Lithuania accuses Russia over Ikea store fire in Vilnius
item.description: Nato allies believe Russia is running sabotage operations to undermine European support for Ukraine.
